prompt: A whimsical yet charming glowtoad resting on a luminous mushroom in an enchanting swamp. The scene is filled with mystic fog under the faint moonlight. The toad and the mushroom both radiate a soft, ethereal glow, casting a magical ambiance around. The background includes towering ancient trees adorned with glowing vines and luminous insects fluttering around. Crickets chirp in the distance, adding to the surreal atmosphere.
